strings.evolution:
My magic arms have been upgraded!
I should be of more use to you now!
strings.affinity: Both magic and knowledge can be good or bad depending on who uses them. However, I get the feeling I can trust you.
strings.description: A young genius from Mysidia who freely wields a pair of giant magic arms. He is able to analyze and understand any machine with a single glance. Thanks to his genius, and even despite his young age, it is said their is no end the the invitations he receives to join various government agencies. However, he declines every one of them, prefering to focus on his own research.
strings.fusion: My magic arms are moving more smoothly than ever before!
strings.summon:
Leave all the magic and machinery to me!
I'm sure I'll be of help to you all!

strings.affinity: Both magic and knowledge can be good or bad depending on who uses them. However, I get the feeling I can trust you.
strings.description: A young genius from Mysidia. However, he since he was raised in Dilmagia, he is skilled not only with magic but also with machines. All of the research that he poured his magic and knowledge of machinery into resulted in him developing the magic arms that float beside him. By freely manipulating these arms, Kelsus is able to stand up to even the greatest of foes.
strings.fusion:
If I were to obtain new knowledge,
then I should do my very best to figure
out how to put it to good use.
strings.summon:
I think it's important to obtain
as much experience as possible.
Please take me somewhere interesting.
